about_the_game:
Frontline Footage is a tactical first-person shooter that throws you directly into the action, featuring a unique bodycam perspective. Developed by D4rkSt0rm Studios, the game puts you in the boots of José Herrera, a rookie officer of Ecuador's GOE (Special Operations Group), as you uncover a conspiracy threatening to destabilize the nation.

Powered by Unreal Engine 5, Frontline Footage delivers a stunning visual experience, with meticulously detailed environments ranging from the streets of Quito to secret military installations. This isn't just a shooter; it's a highly realistic combat experience where stealth, precision, and teamwork are essential for survival.

The missions are designed to challenge both your tactical skills and moral decisions. As you progress, you’ll confront the harsh realities of corruption and personal sacrifice, making every bullet fired and every enemy defeated carry weight in the unfolding narrative.

content_descriptors.notes:
Frontline Footage contains mature content intended for adult audiences. The game features realistic depictions of violence, including intense firefights, injuries, and blood effects associated with tactical combat. The storyline involves themes of corruption, criminal networks, and moral dilemmas that explore the darker sides of justice. While there are no depictions of sexual content, players may encounter references to drug and alcohol use within certain missions, reflecting the criminal elements of the story.

This content is designed to add realism to the narrative and may not be suitable for all players.

name: Frontline Footage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10, 64-bit Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5-1600 / Intel Core i5-7600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Frontline Footage is a tactical first-person shooter with a bodycam perspective. Play as José Herrera, a GOE rookie officer, and uncover a conspiracy in Ecuador. Featuring realistic graphics and strategic gameplay, every decision is crucial for survival.
